

已有一个可以运行在目标板mx23上的内核，现在将anroid修改的部分添加到这个内核上。

cp -rf fs/yaffs2/ /home/linux/Project/mx23/linux-2.6.31/fs/ 
cp -rf drivers/staging/android/ /home/linux/Project/mx23/linux-2.6.31/drivers/staging/
cp -rf drivers/switch/ /home/linux/Project/mx23/linux-2.6.31/drivers/

make_ext4fs -l 128M -a system out/target/product/imx53_hs13/obj/PACKAGING/systemimage_intermediates/system.img out/target/product/imx53_hs13/system
make_ext4fs -l 10M -a recovery out/target/product/imx53_hs13/recovery.img out/target/product/imx53_hs13/recovery/root
